Text: Why only 24 minutes? If this is a documentary, why is the story so short?
24 minutes is a long time. usually, for TV purposes, episodes that fill 30 minute slots contain 22 minutes not counting commercials. 1 hour shows are 44 minutes give or take 30- 40 seconds

Don't bother downloading this.  Watch the one called The True Story instead.  This is hard to follow and is much less watchable.  I am a 6th grade social studies teacher and although I couldn't use either of these for class, I still would watch the other documentary over this one.
